pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zeal is a simple offline API documentation browser inspired by Dash (OS X app), available for Linux and Windows. Quickly search documentation using Alt+Space (or customised) hotkey to display Zeal from any place in your workspace. - Search in multiple sets of documentation at once. - Don't be dependent on your internet connection. - Integrate Zeal with Emacs, Sublime Text, or Vim. All documentation available for Dash is also available for Zeal. You can also generate your own docsets using the same format Dash uses.
